key_points.text:
Here is What to Know Beyond Why Newmont Corporation (NEM) is a Trending Stock
Neutral Sentiment:
Investors are debating whether to buy after a 39% rally in six months, driven by higher gold prices amid trade and geopolitical uncertainties.
Should You Buy Newmont Stock After a 39% Rally in 6 Months?
National Bank Financial lifted its FY2025 EPS estimate to $5.20 (from $4.56) and raised FY2026 to $6.49, reflecting a stronger earnings outlook.

Newmont FY2025 EPS Increased by National Bank Financial
Positive Sentiment:
NEM unlocked value from its 2025 divestitures, netting $3 billion to fund growth initiatives and boost shareholder returns.
Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) has seen its shares rise on the back of upgraded earnings forecasts, strategic asset sales and continued analyst support.
Zacks notes NEM as a trending stock, reflecting high investor interest but cautioning that popularity alone isn’t a buy signal.
